MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the CH3 postcode area of Chester, affecting properties in Tattenhall Road and surrounding streets. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 5.00PM to replace a damaged electrical pole. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead line network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 10.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.34PM on 28th January 2021.
